dcterms:description: A novel corpus of 319.57 hours of video from 54 professionally produced titles, used to study human dubbing practices.

dcterms:description: A bilingual prosodic dataset compiled for spoken language translation, used to analyze human dubbing.

dcterms:description: A dataset for spoken language recognition, utilized in the context of audio analysis for dubbing.

dcterms:description: A tool for trainable text-speech alignment using Kaldi, applied in the analysis of dubbed dialogues.
